thread.title: Chris Brown Neighbor Reveals She Used To Hear Him Beating Karrueche 'I Used To Cry'
thread.title_full: Chris Brown Neighbor Reveals She Used To Hear Him Beating Karrueche 'I Used To Cry'

title: Chris Brown Neighbor Reveals She Used To Hear Him Beating Karrueche 'I Used To Cry'
text:
Chris Brown Neighbor Reveals She Used To Hear Him Beating Karrueche 'I Used To Cry' posted by Isha Thorpe - 
More developments about Karrueche Tran 's restraining order and allegedly abusive relationship with Chris Brown are continuing to surface. Now, singer Kay Cola is claiming that she heard Brown beat Tran multiple times. { "position1" : { "type" : "artist", "id" : 33210, "name" : "Chris Brown" } } 
Cola was one of Brown's neighbors at the time he dated the model. On Twitter, Cola revealed that the beatings were so bad that she called the police. She also spoke about how hearing Tran's loud screams broke her heart because she was once in an abusive relationship, too. 
Read her tweets about the matter below. Some of y'all make me sick to my stomach talking about. Karrueches lying. I've heard him beating her myself. I even called the police:
